user_input: Please create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use Hydrogen as the carrier. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.
